mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1986 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1986 Barter Theatre season, April 4- Oct 19. Productions include: I Do! I Do! | Vanities | Typist and the Tiger | Androcles and the Lion | World of Magic | Toby Show | I Ought to be in Pictures | Billy Bishop Goes to War | Foreigner | Morning's at Seven | Ten Little Indians | Bedroom Farce | 'Night Mother. Barter Theatre Founded 1933.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
